title: Need a way to select over a slice or map
body:
by **mail@duncanpearson.net**: 
Language enhancement request:

Could we have a syntax for a select which waits for the first of a slice
(or map) of channels?

I cannot see a good way otherwise of implementing concurrent execution of
arbitrary dependency graphs. Obviously it would need to use the same
expression for each element of the slice, and also that expression would
need to include reference to a variable the value of which would either be
the index in the slice or the key if it was a map.
